title: ElcomSoft Distributed Password Recovery 2.99 Build 481[BUZZccd]
description:
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img854/452/a9q8.jpg[/img]

Elcomsoft Distributed Password Recovery - a program for finding lost or forgotten passwords allocated to different types of documents. Allows you to find the passwords to documents using the computational power of computers in a network. The program consists of three components: server, agent and console. The server is installed on a computer on the network and manages the process of brute force. At any computers on the network can be an agent, which moves a portion of passwords issued to the server. Since any computer can run the console, which allows control over the server, add new tasks, and view statistics.

The program allows you to:
- Find passwords for documents using the computational power of computers in a network
- Work in local and global computer networks
- To remotely administer the server brute force
- Install and uninstall agents on computers
- Change the time of the agents and the priority
- Launch agents and server as a service running
- To collect and view statistics

Supported document formats:
Word 97-2003, Excel 97-2003, PowerPoint XP-2003 (password to open the document)
Word 97-2003, Excel 97-2003: guaranteed decryption of documents with the application of 40-bit encryption key (encryption by default)
The Secret Keys PGP (*. Skr), PGP Disk (*. Pgd), PGP archives
PGP ZIP files (*. Pgp)
PKCS # 12 certificates (*. Pfx)
Adobe Acrobat PDF with 128 bit key length ("owner" and "user" passwords)
Adobe Acrobat PDF with 40-bit key length ("owner" and "user" passwords)
Adobe Acrobat PDF with 40-bit key length (guaranteed decryption of the document)
Passwords Windows (LM / NTLM)
The following program is planned to increase the number of supported formats
